signature.instructions: Classify product complaints into specific categories.

fields.prefix: Reasoning: Let's think step by step in order to

fields.description: One of: Stability/Appearance defect, Device malfunction, Storage/Temperature excursion, Labeling error, Contamination/Foreign matter, Packaging defect, Counterfeit/Unauthorized source, Potency/Assay defect, Distribution/Expiry
